Generation VI.X: It can tell how its Trainer is feeling by subtle shifts in the grip on its horns. This empathic sense lets them run as if one being.
Generation VI.Y: They inhabit mountainous regions. The leader of the herd is decided by a battle of clashing horns.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: It can tell how its Trainer is feeling by subtle shifts in the grip on its horns. This empathic sense lets them run as if one being.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: They inhabit mountainous regions. The leader of the herd is decided by a battle of clashing horns.

Generation IX.Scarlet: It can sense the feelings of others by touching them with its horns. This species has assisted people with their work since 5,000 years ago.
Generation IX.Violet: These Pokémon live in herds in mountainous places. The victor in their contests of clashing horns will become the leader of the herd.
